original_text: And they shall be afraid: pangs and sorrows shall take hold of them; they shall be in pain as a woman that travaileth: they shall be amazed one at another; their faces shall be as flames.
korean_text: 그들이 놀라며 괴로움과 슬픔에 사로잡혀 해산이 임박한 여자 같이 고통하며 서로 보고 놀라며 얼굴이 불꽃 같으리로다

sentences.original_text: pangs and sorrows shall take hold of them
they shall be in pain as a woman that travaileth
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 해산하는 여인처럼 고통을 겪을 것이며

sentences.original_text: they shall be amazed one at another
their faces shall be as flames
